description: Molayne is Sophocles`s cousin. He is the director of the Hokulani Observatory on Ula`ula Island and like to take a lot of pictures of the starry sky. Sophocles calls his cousin Big Mo. He is also a skilled Pokémon Trainer and a friend of Professor Kukui. One day, Sophocles showed a picture of him and his cousin to the Pokémon School class.
name: Mullein
